response_time.Description: Response time column not used for this data

sample.Description: Event sample starting at 0 (Matlab convention starting at 1)

block.Description: start and end of an experimental block

Levels.spawned: box spawned on table in front of participant
Levels.touched: participant completed reach-to-touch, moment of collision with object

Levels.normal: congruent sensory feedback, collider size matches object size
Levels.conflict: incongruent sensory feedback, collider size bigger than object size causing to too-early sensory feedback

cube.Description: location of spawned object from participants perspective

isiTime.Description: inter-stimulus-interval; time elapsed from trial start to object spawn

reaction_time.Description: duration of reach-to-touch; time elapsed between object spawn and object touch

emsWidth.Description: electrical muscle stimulation parameter: pulse width

pulseCount.Description: electrical muscle stimulation parameter: pulse count

visualFeedback.Description: remove rendering of object after touching
